title: Workshop on Language Learning Design Based on Pattern Languages and Bundles

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental language learning concepts and basic job-related language application skills
context.additional_context: Custom-designed language skill enhancement for working professionals, emphasizing collaboration and self-directed learning in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more language learning scenarios tailored to work contexts using pattern language and bundle-based instructional methods
Learners collaboratively solve real-world workplace problems through two or more language learning projects in a PBL (Problem-Based Learning) environment with peers
Learners iteratively improve learning designs via formative assessments and incorporate peer feedback five or more times
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
